TileMap#

class TileMap#

A class that represents a Tiled map.

Warning

This class is currently only compatible with orthogonal maps and tile layers (no objects).

Public Functions

TileMap(const std::string &tmxPath)#

Constructs a tile map from a TMX file.

Parameters:

tmxPath â€“ The path to the TMX file.

void draw()#

Draw the tile map layers.
